review: It's a great little device that helps me to watch streaming services such as Netflix and Hulu Plus onto my TV without the use of a desktop.  I do wish though that the function of streaming from a PC to the Chromecast was a bit more fluid and the delay between the two wasn't as significant as it is.
author: MooMoo

review: The device sets up and works great, however, when I pause Netfix, a lot of times I have to re-link the Chromecast to get the program going again.  While that is not a major undertaking, it is frustrating.  That is the only problem I've had with the device.
